infos.value: F-Father...!
You needn't...worry.
Minwu, his body cannot bear much more.
Mont... I...will be...fine.
Father, you cannot go any further!
Even so, we cannot turn back, Lord Mont.
If you're worried about Fennes's soldiers, they have likely lost our trail.
Then you would have us rest here for a while?
Yes, I would. Father can't go on much longer like this.
If we cannot count on your assistance to Lady Glaciela...
You would have us killed?
I would do no such thing.
King Khury would be the one to desire such an outcome.
Surely you jest.
Wezette and Leonis are allies.
Leonis is the only party who believes such an allegiance exists.
Even as we speak, the elite of Wezette are coming to hunt all of you down.
Why would King Khury be after us?
Could it be that he believes we will aid Glaciela in her revolt?
That is most certainly a factor. Alas, the main reason is Wezette's desire to ally with Fennes.
Unbelievable!
You're saying that your king would offer up our heads on a platter to ally with Muraga!?
That is precisely what I'm saying.
King Khury has long sought this allegiance. He is not one to decide something in undue haste.
Allying with Fennes instead of Leonis would ensure the preservation of his kingdom.
So if we rest here, we risk being discovered by Wezette's forces?
Yes, so we must press onward. Whatever the cost.
